description: standing male figure wearing dark colored clothing with vertical blue irregular stripes on pants; man has dark hair with receding hairline and small goatee; painterly color swaths in background in brown, green, yellow and blue; white vertical painterly line to right of figure; irregularly applied, dripping shiny clear resin over image
